title: Systems Desinger
description:
Job Description:
We are seeking an enthusiastic Junior Systems Engineer to join our IT team. In this entry-level role, you will support the design, implementation, and maintenance of system infrastructures under the guidance of senior engineers. You will assist with troubleshooting, monitoring system performance, and ensuring smooth day-to-day operations. This position is ideal for recent graduates who are eager to learn and build a strong foundation in systems engineering.

Responsibilities:

Assist in installing, configuring, and maintaining hardware, software, and networks.

Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues as they arise.

Support backup, recovery, and security operations.

Work with senior engineers to implement system upgrades and patches.

Document processes and provide user support when required.

Qualifications:

Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

Basic understanding of operating systems (Windows/Linux) and networking.

Familiarity with system administration tools and concepts.

Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to learn.

Good communication and teamwork abilities.
